get.description: This calculates neuron morphology metrics for a given reconstruction                     morphology.

post.description: Calculates morphology metrics for a given morphologies.

Circuit.title: Circuit
Circuit.description: Class representing a circuit, i.e., pointing to a SONATA config and possible additional assets.

id_str.description: ID of the entity in string format.

timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

amplitude.title: Amplitude
amplitude.description: The injected current. Given in nanoamps.

ConstantCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Constant Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
ConstantCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A constant current injection at a fixed absolute amplitude.

feature_dict.title: Feature Dict
feature_dict.description: Mapping of feature name to its metric values. Each entry contains at least an 'avg', and optionally 'unit', 'num_traces', etc.

ElectrophysiologyMetricsOutput.title: ElectrophysiologyMetricsOutput
ElectrophysiologyMetricsOutput.description: Output schema for electrophysiological metrics extracted using BluePyEfe.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

FullySynchronousSpikeStimulus.title: Fully Synchronous Spikes (Efferent)
FullySynchronousSpikeStimulus.description: Spikes sent at the same time from all neurons in the source neuron set         to efferently connected neurons in the target neuron set.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

HyperpolarizingCurrentClampSomaticStimul.title: Hyperpolarizing Somatic Current Clamp
HyperpolarizingCurrentClampSomaticStimul.description: A hyperpolarizing current injection which brings a cell to base membrance voltage.         The holding current is pre-defined for each cell.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

IDNeuronSet.title: ID Neuron Set
IDNeuronSet.description: Neuron set definition by providing a list of neuron IDs.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

amplitude_start.title: Start Amplitude
amplitude_start.description: The amount of current initially injected when the stimulus activates. Given in nanoamps.

amplitude_end.title: End Amplitude
amplitude_end.description: If given, current is interpolated such that current reaches this value when the stimulus concludes. Otherwise, current stays at 'Start Amplitude'. Given in nanoamps.

LinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Linear Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
LinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A current injection which changes linearly in absolute ampltude over time.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Calculates the min/max ratio of the principal direction extents                 along the plane.

circularity.title: circularity
circularity.description: Calculates the circularity of the morphology points along the plane.

length_fraction_above_soma.title: length_fraction_above_soma
length_fraction_above_soma.description: Returns the length fraction of the segments that have their midpoints                             higher than the soma.

max_radial_distance.title: max_radial_distance
max_radial_distance.description: The maximum radial distance from the soma in micrometers.

number_of_neurites.title: number_of_neurites
number_of_neurites.description: Number of neurites in a morphology.

soma_radius.title: soma_radius [μm]
soma_radius.description: The radius of the soma in micrometers.

soma_surface_area.title: soma_surface_area [μm^2]
soma_surface_area.description: The surface area of the soma in square micrometers.

total_length.title: total_length [μm]
total_length.description: The total length of the morphology neurites in micrometers.

total_height.title: total_width [μm]
total_height.description: The total width (X-range) of the morphology in micrometers.

total_depth.title: total_depth [μm]
total_depth.description: The total depth (Z-range) of the morphology in micrometers.

total_area.title: total_area [μm^2]
total_area.description: The total surface area of all sections in square micrometers.

total_volume.title: total_volume [μm^3]
total_volume.description: The total volume of all sections in cubic micrometers.

section_lengths.title: section_lengths [μm]
section_lengths.description: The distribution of lengths per section in micrometers.

segment_radii.title: segment_radii [μm]
segment_radii.description: The distribution of radii of the morphology in micrometers.

number_of_sections.title: number_of_sections
number_of_sections.description: The number of sections in the morphology.

local_bifurcation_angles.title: local_bifurcation_angles [rad]
local_bifurcation_angles.description: Angles between two sections computed at the bifurcation (local).

remote_bifurcation_angles.title: remote_bifurcation_angles [rad]
remote_bifurcation_angles.description: Angles between two sections computed at the end of the sections (remote).

section_path_distances.title: section_path_distances [μm]
section_path_distances.description: Path distances from the soma to section endpoints in micrometers.

section_radial_distances.title: section_radial_distances [μm]
section_radial_distances.description: Radial distance from the soma to section endpoints in micrometers.

section_branch_orders.title: section_branch_orders
section_branch_orders.description: The distribution of branch orders of sections, computed from soma.

section_strahler_orders.title: section_strahler_orders
section_strahler_orders.description: The distribution of strahler branch orders of sections, computed from terminals.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

amplitude.title: Amplitude
amplitude.description: The amount of current initially injected when each pulse activates. Given in nanoamps (nA).

width.title: Pulse Width
width.description: The length of time each pulse lasts. Given in milliseconds (ms).

frequency.title: Pulse Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of pulse trains. Given in Hertz (Hz).

MultiPulseCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Multi Pulse Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
MultiPulseCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A series of current pulses injected at a fixed frequency, with each pulse having a fixed absolute amplitude and temporal width.

NamedTuple.title: NamedTuple
NamedTuple.description: Helper class to assign a name to a tuple of elements.

NeuronSetReference.title: NeuronSetReference
NeuronSetReference.description: A reference to a NeuronSet block.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

mean_amplitude.title: Mean Amplitude
mean_amplitude.description: The mean value of current to inject. Given in nanoamps (nA).

variance.title: Variance
variance.description: The variance around the mean of current to inject using a                     normal distribution.

NormallyDistributedCurrentClampSomaticSt.title: Normally Distributed Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
NormallyDistributedCurrentClampSomaticSt.description: Normally distributed current injection with a mean absolute amplitude.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: Mean frequency (Hz) of the Poisson input.

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Seed for the random number generator to ensure reproducibility of the spike generation.

PoissonSpikeStimulus.title: Poisson Spikes (Efferent)
PoissonSpikeStimulus.description: Spike times drawn from a Poisson process with a given frequency         sent from all neurons in the source neuron set to efferently connected             neurons in the target neuron set.

id_str.title: Id Str
id_str.description: ID of the entity in string format.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: Sart time of the timestamps in milliseconds (ms).

RegularTimestamps.title: Regular Timestamps
RegularTimestamps.description: A series of timestamps at regular intervals.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

percentage_of_threshold_current.title: Percentage of Threshold Current
percentage_of_threshold_current.description: The percentage of a cell’s threshold current to inject when the stimulus                     activates.

RelativeConstantCurrentClampSomaticStimu.title: Constant Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
RelativeConstantCurrentClampSomaticStimu.description: A constant current injection at a percentage of each cell's threshold current.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

percentage_of_threshold_current_start.title: Percentage of Threshold Current (Start)
percentage_of_threshold_current_start.description: The percentage of a cell's threshold current to inject when the stimulus activates.

percentage_of_threshold_current_end.title: Percentage of Threshold Current (End)
percentage_of_threshold_current_end.description: If given, the percentage of a cell's threshold current is interpolated such that the percentage reaches this value when the stimulus concludes.

RelativeLinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulu.title: Linear Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
RelativeLinearCurrentClampSomaticStimulu.description: A current injection which changes linearly as a percentage of each cell's threshold current over time.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

mean_percentage_of_threshold_current.title: Percentage of Threshold Current (Mean)
mean_percentage_of_threshold_current.description: The mean value of current to inject as a percentage of a cell's                     threshold current.

variance.title: Variance
variance.description: The variance around the mean of current to inject using a                     normal distribution.

RelativeNormallyDistributedCurrentClampS.title: Normally Distributed Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
RelativeNormallyDistributedCurrentClampS.description: Normally distributed current injection around a mean percentage of each cell's threshold current.

use_scaling.title: Scale U_SE (ACh)
use_scaling.description: Scale the U_SE (ACh) parameter of the Tsodyks–Markram synaptic model.

ScaleAcetylcholineUSESynapticManipulatio.title: Demo: Scale U_SE to Modulate Acetylcholine Effect on Synaptic Release Probability
ScaleAcetylcholineUSESynapticManipulatio.description: Applying a scaling factor to the U_SE parameter which determines the effect of achetylcholine (ACh) on synaptic release probability using the Tsodyks–Markram synaptic model.        This is applied for all synapses between biophysical neurons.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: Sart time of the timestamps in milliseconds (ms).

SingleTimestamp.title: Single Timestamp
SingleTimestamp.description: A single timestamp at a specified time.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

maximum_amplitude.title: Maximum Amplitude
maximum_amplitude.description: The maximum (and starting) amplitude of the sinusoid. Given in nanoamps (nA).

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the waveform. Given in Hertz (Hz).

dt.title: Timestep
dt.description: Timestep of generated signal in milliseconds (ms).

SinusoidalCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Sinusoidal Somatic Current Clamp (Absolute)
SinusoidalCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A sinusoidal current injection with a fixed frequency and maximum absolute amplitude.

dt.title: Timestep
dt.description: Interval between recording time steps in milliseconds (ms).

SomaVoltageRecording.title: Soma Voltage Recording (Full Experiment)
SomaVoltageRecording.description: Records the soma voltage of a neuron set for the full length of the experiment.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: Timestamps at which the stimulus is applied.

neuron_set.title: Neuron Set
neuron_set.description: Neuron set to which the stimulus is applied.

timestamp_offset.title: Timestamp Offset
timestamp_offset.description: The offset of the stimulus relative to each timestamp in milliseconds (ms).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Time duration in milliseconds for how long input is activated.

percentage_below_threshold.title: Percentage Below Threshold
percentage_below_threshold.description: A percentage adjusted from 100 of a cell's threshold current.                         E.g. 20 will apply 80\% of the threshold current. Using a negative                             value will give more than 100. E.g. -20 will inject 120\% of the                                 threshold current.

SubthresholdCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.title: Subthreshold Somatic Current Clamp (Relative)
SubthresholdCurrentClampSomaticStimulus.description: A subthreshold current injection at a percentage below each cell's threshold current.

SynapticMgManipulation.title: Demo: Synaptic Mg2+ Concentration Manipulation
SynapticMgManipulation.description: Manipulate the extracellular synaptic magnesium (Mg2+) concentration.        This is applied for all synapses between biophysical neurons.

dt.title: Timestep
dt.description: Interval between recording time steps in milliseconds (ms).

TimeWindowSomaVoltageRecording.title: Soma Voltage Recording (Time Window)
TimeWindowSomaVoltageRecording.description: Records the soma voltage of a neuron set over a specified time window.

TimestampsReference.title: TimestampsReference
TimestampsReference.description: A reference to a NeuronSet block.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

nbS1POmInputs.title: Demo: nbS1 POm Inputs
nbS1POmInputs.description: Virtual neurons projecting from the POm thalamic nucleus to biophysical cortical neurons in the nbS1 model.

sample_percentage.title: Sample (Percentage)
sample_percentage.description: Percentage of neurons to sample between 0 and 100%

nbS1VPMInputs.title: Demo: nbS1 VPM Inputs
nbS1VPMInputs.description: Virtual neurons projecting from the VPM thalamic nucleus to biophysical cortical neurons in the nbS1 model.

extracellular_calcium_concentration.title: Extracellular Calcium Concentration
extracellular_calcium_concentration.description: Extracellular calcium concentration around the synapse in millimoles (mM). Increasing this value increases the probability of synaptic vesicle release, which in turn increases the level of network activity. In vivo values are estimated to be ~0.9-1.2mM, whilst in vitro values are on the order of 2mM.
